We are also delighted to see progress in Turkey. Turkey has had a great and successful path in recent years.
Turkey demonstrates its principled position on the processes in the world and depends on Turkey's position and position.
As stronger as Turkey, Azerbaijan will be so strong.
I have worked and will continue to work to further develop Turkish-Azerbaijani relations.
With our dear brother, President Abdullah Gul, we have done a lot in recent years to strengthen this unity.
Today, our relations are at the alliance level.
I think that Turkey and Azerbaijan are the most closely connected countries in the world.
Turkey's support increases our strength and we are grateful for this support.
Today, at the same time, we are connecting and already out of the regional frameworks, into the global context (cont) http://t.co/bmAPjvILH0
But thanks to the friendship and friendship between Turkey and Azerbaijan, we have managed to achieve these projects.
Today, mutual investment issues are successfully solved and Azerbaijan's largest (cont) http://t.co/D8YqQAtWHY
This process continues and the Azerbaijani economy will be invested $ 15-17 billion in the next five years.
At the same time, we welcome the investments made by Turkish companies in Azerbaijan and support the relations between businessmen.
Today, two independent states - Turkey and Azerbaijan are constantly supporting each other, increasing the power of each other.
I am convinced that in the future, our cooperation and cooperation will be enhanced.
